overview: An art gallery is the scene for some mainly unrelated sex scenes in this slap-happy scorcher. Sharon Mitchell plays Zoey, a rough and ready owner of the showroom who makes the most of her powerful position by taking whatever she desires... including any sexual partners she finds appealing. Amber Lynn plays Marsella, a model who shows up for an appointment with Zoe and enjoys a rendezvous with Joey Silvera while she waits.
title: Dangerous Women
